dc_title_s: Five Year Transportation Program (5YTP) - Bridges: Michigan
dc_description_s: The Five-Year Transportation Program (5YTP) is an annual document listing road and bridge projects planned for the next five years. A snapshot of 5YTP projects is produced annually and presented for approval to the State Transportation Commission. The 5YTP snapshot is later archived and the document is posted on MDOT s Web site. A Web-based interactive state map is available which plots individual projects for the public to easily view. Please see the MDOT Metadata Form for additional information or visit the 5YTP Website. Update Cycle: The Five Year Transportation Program (5YTP) layer was last updated in January 2016 and is updated on an annual basis.Data Quality: The GIS layer is generated from MDOT s MAP database 5YTP archive snapshot.Coverage: This layer covers all projects in the current 5YTP snapshot.Contact: Eric Mullen, mullene@michigan.gov
